doc.field: Folder re: Spadafora's article for WNYF re: wastewater treatment (with floppy and CD). Drafts of green design chapters, with some related emails and permission tables. Folder with print matter re: photovoltaic/solar (with 7 CDs on the topic, looks like codes and "fire ops"). Loose articles and print matter on green/solar/refrigerants/or pollution; some FDNY documents in here, such as AUC 351 (Photovoltaic (Solar Panel) Electrical Systems). Folder of material for Spadafora article in WNYF on wind turbines with CDs and floppy with photos of turbines (including Navy Yard 2010). Materials on green buildings in NYC, especially the Tribeca Green, Visionaire and Solaire all in Battery Park City. Some unlabeled and mixed subject digital materials re: Spadafora presentation on green design at FDIC International conference, 2015. Book on architecture. (Includes digital formats)
